root.name: Berserk: Millennium Falcon Hen Seima Senki no Shou
root.description: Berserk: Millennium Falcon is at its very core a Hack and Slash kind of game. It does contain a rather good amount of gameplay mechanics which do make fun.To start with players will play the game as Guts (otherwise known as The Black Swordsmen). Guts carries with him a very large amount of weapons. The primary weapon is Guts sword called the Dragonslayer. Secondary weapons include a mini-crossbow, throwing knives, grenades, and finally the arm cannon all of these weapons are available to the player from the very start of the game.On a side note the does have a form of party system. However, all of the other characters in the game are used more for spells than actually fighting beside you.Berserk: Millennium Falcon Hen Seima Senki no Shou takes place during volumes 22 to 27 of the main story. It should be noted that only one character featured in this game does not appear in the original manga. The name of this character is Charles.
